module.name: geometric_validation_property_representation
module.keywords: module, geometric validation properties, centroid, surface area, volume.
module.purpose: The Geometric validation property representation application module supports the requirement to assign geometric validation properties to solid or surface models. These enable geometric translations or transformations performed during an exchange to be validated.

inscope.li: the assignment of geometric validation properties to individual solid or surface models. These properties include centroid, volume, and total surface area for solids. For surface models the properties addressed are centroid and surface area;
the assignment of geometric validation properties to assemblies and their components;
assignment of geometric validation properties to instances of components and/or sub-assemblies in an assembly.

outscope.li: the assignment of properties for non-solid or non-surface models;
the assignment of any properties to a product or its definition.

uof.name: Geometric_Validation_Property_Representation
uof.description: The Geometric_Validation_Property_Representation UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of representation of geometric validation properties for solid or surface models.
